Plot: A thriller about a Copenhagen cop who moves to a small town after having a nervous breakdown.
Title: Terribly Happy
Writer: Henrik Ruben Genz (screenplay), Dunja Gry Jensen (screenplay), Erling Jepsen (novel)
Actors: Jakob Cedergren, Lene Maria Christensen, Kim Bodnia, Lars Brygmann
tomatoConsensus: Led by Henrik Ruben Ganz's assured direction, this knotty Danish noir thriller steers audiences into some nicely unexpected territory.
